alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Inlet Area; Everett and Vicinity; Western Skagit County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 6:51AM PST until January 17 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation, mostly freezing rain. Additional accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lowlands of western Skagit County, including Cypress Island, Guemes Island, Anacortes, Mount Vernon, and La Conner, Everett and vicinity, including Stanwood, Marysville, and Mountlake Terrace and Admiralty Inlet Area, including Port Townsend, Whidbey Island, and Camano Island. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially in areas where temperatures remain below or at freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Inlet Area; Everett and Vicinity; Western Skagit County
